name: Paula Judith Johnson
what_you_do: Paula Judith Johnson is a romance author and the creator and host of the Writing Romance Mastery Summit, where she helps authors improve their writing, publishing, and marketing skills.
who_you_serve: She serves aspiring and experienced romance authors looking to enhance their writing skills and gain insights into the publishing industry.
seeking: Guest speakers for the Writing Romance Mastery Summit.
offering: Access to a platform for guest speakers, insights on writing craft, publishing, and marketing.
current_projects: Writing Romance Mastery Summit held every February and August, Co-Host of The Fantasy Sci-Fi Authors Summit.
bio: Amazon Best-Selling author, Finalist award in the Historical Romance category at the Book Excellence Awards.
business_focus: Paula Judith Johnson is a romance author and the creator and host of the Writing Romance Mastery Summit, where she helps authors improve their writing, publishing, and marketing skills. (romance writing)
